msbt.message: OhmigoshI have FLEAS? Grody. And not good for my pop-star image! Now I feel all self-consciousBut I'm glad it was my bestie who found it first! Thank you SO much! I appreciate it!

Are you EVEN serious right now? I had fleas?!GRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOODYYYY!If you hadn't taken them off me, my pop-star career'd be ruined before I even started practicing for it!You totally saved the day—AND my celebrity status—! Thank you SO MUCH!
WHAT? There were FLEAS on me? No soon-to-be-famous singer ever wants to hear she's got FLEAS!But you were so cool to catch them for me. You've got some fab bug- catching skills, !
GET. OUT! I had FLEAS?<10_4 /> Ohmigoshohmigoshohmigosh I hope nobody else noticed.Thanks to your fabulous bug- catching skills, I'm flea-free!
SERIOUSLY?! I had fleas?! And I didn't know it?! GRODY TO THE MAX!For serious, thanks for getting rid of them!

Yuck! Fleas! I wondered why I've been so itchy lately! I haven't been that itchy since the last time I hadI almost said, "The last time I had fleas!" That's hilarious!Because I've never had fleas, . Not even this time.
